cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's en

sentence.kanji: カレーライスは700円です。
sentence.romaji: kare-raisu ha nanahyakuen desu
sentence.english: The curry and rice is 700 yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's warui

sentence.kanji: たばこは体に悪い。
sentence.romaji: tabako ha karada ni warui
sentence.english: Cigarettes are bad for your health.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's en

sentence.kanji: そこに大きな円を描いて。
sentence.romaji: soko ni ooki na en wo kaite
sentence.english: Draw a big circle there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sawaru

sentence.kanji: 絵に触らないでください。
sentence.romaji: e ni sawaranai de kudasai
sentence.english: Please don't touch the painting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaiketsu

sentence.kanji: トラブルがやっと解決した。
sentence.romaji: toraburu ga yato kaiketsu shita
sentence.english: The problem has finally been solved.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sankaku

sentence.kanji: 紙を三角に切りました。
sentence.romaji: kami wo sankaku ni kirimashita
sentence.english: I cut the paper into a triangle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikaku

sentence.kanji: 紙を四角に切ってください。
sentence.romaji: kami wo shikaku ni kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please cut the paper into a square.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shikakui

sentence.kanji: こっちの四角いテーブルを買おうよ。
sentence.romaji: kochi no shikakui te-buru wo kaouyo
sentence.english: Let's buy this square table over here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kado

sentence.kanji: 次の角で左に曲がってください。
sentence.romaji: tsugi no kado de hidari ni magate kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn left at the next corner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yotsukado

sentence.kanji: あそこの四つ角を左に曲がってください。
sentence.romaji: asoko no yotsukado wo hidari ni magate kudasai
sentence.english: Please turn left at that crossroad up there.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's magarikado

sentence.kanji: ポストはそこの曲がり角にあります。
sentence.romaji: posuto ha soko no magarikado ni arimasu
sentence.english: There's a post box on that corner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousei

sentence.kanji: システムの構成を変えてみました。
sentence.romaji: shisutemu no kousei wo kaete mimashita
sentence.english: I've tried to reorganize the system.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouzou

sentence.kanji: この建物の構造は複雑です。
sentence.romaji: kono tatemono no kouzou ha fukuzatsu desu
sentence.english: The structure of this building is complex.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yubiwa

sentence.kanji: 彼女に指輪をプレゼントしました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ni yubiwa wo purezento shimashita
sentence.english: I gave her a ring as a gift.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's futatabi

sentence.kanji: 彼は再びここに戻ってきた。
sentence.romaji: kare ha futatabi koko ni modote kita
sentence.english: He came back here once again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenjou

sentence.kanji: この部屋は天井が高いですね。
sentence.romaji: kono heya ha tenjou ga takai desu ne
sentence.english: This room has a high ceiling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenkai

sentence.kanji: あなたの見解を聞かせてください。
sentence.romaji: anata no kenkai wo kikasete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me your opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's rikai

sentence.kanji: 理解してくれてありがとう。
sentence.romaji: rikai shite kurete arigatou
sentence.english: Thank you for understanding.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's toku

sentence.kanji: この問題を解けますか。
sentence.romaji: kono mondai wo tokemasu ka
sentence.english: Can you solve this question?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokeru

sentence.kanji: やっと難しい問題が解けました。
sentence.romaji: yato muzukashii mondai ga tokemashita
sentence.english: We finally solved a difficult problem.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakudo

sentence.kanji: この角度からは画面が見えにくいですね。
sentence.romaji: kono kakudo karaha gamen ga mie nikui desu ne
sentence.english: It's difficult to see the screen from this angle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's machikado

sentence.kanji: 町角にカフェがありました。
sentence.romaji: machikado ni kafue ga arimashita
sentence.english: There was a cafe on the street corner.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chokaku

sentence.kanji: ここで直角に曲がってください。
sentence.romaji: koko de chokaku ni magate kudasai
sentence.english: Please make a 90 degree turn here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hougaku

sentence.kanji: 私と彼は帰る方角が同じです。
sentence.romaji: watashi to kare ha kaeru hougaku ga onaji desu
sentence.english: He and I go home in the same direction.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mashikaku

sentence.kanji: 彼の部屋には真四角な窓があったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare no heya ni ha mashikaku na mado ga ata n da
sentence.english: There was a square window in his room.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's warukuchi

sentence.kanji: 彼は決して人の悪口を言わないの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha keshite hito no warukuchi wo iwanai no
sentence.english: He never speaks ill of people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's giron

sentence.kanji: 父は議論好きです。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha gironzuki desu
sentence.english: My father likes engaging in debates.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ketsuron

sentence.kanji: 今日の話し合いでは結論が出なかった。
sentence.romaji: kyou no hanashiai de ha ketsuron ga denakata
sentence.english: We did not reach a conclusion in our discussion today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seron

sentence.kanji: 世論はあなたの味方です。
sentence.romaji: seron ha anata no mikata desu
sentence.english: Public opinion is your ally.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's riron

sentence.kanji: 彼は大学で音楽の理論を勉強したんだよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha daigaku de ongaku no riron wo benkyou shita n da yo
sentence.english: He studied music theory in college.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hanron

sentence.kanji: 反論がある人はどうぞ。
sentence.romaji: hanron ga aru hito ha douzo
sentence.english: Please speak up if you have an objection.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoron

sentence.kanji: 世論は新しい法律に反対です。
sentence.romaji: yoron ha atarashii houritsu ni hantai desu
sentence.english: Public opinion is against the new law.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ronriteki

sentence.kanji: 彼は論理的な人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ronriteki na hito desu
sentence.english: He's a logical person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ijiwaru

sentence.kanji: 彼は時々意地悪な質問をする。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tokidoki ijiwaru na shitsumon wo suru 。
sentence.english: He sometimes raises nasty questions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaitou

sentence.kanji: インターネットで試験の解答を確認したんだ。
sentence.romaji: inta-neto de shiken no kaitou wo kakunin shita n da
sentence.english: I checked the answers to the exam on the Internet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's bunkai

sentence.kanji: 機械を分解してみたの。
sentence.romaji: kikai wo bunkai shite mita no
sentence.english: I tried to take the machine apart.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ronri

sentence.kanji: 数学は論理に基づく学問です。
sentence.romaji: suugaku ha ronri ni motozuku gakumon desu
sentence.english: Mathematics is a field of study based on logic.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's muron

sentence.kanji: ぼくは無論きみに賛成だ。
sentence.romaji: boku ha muron kimi ni sansei da
sentence.english: Of course, I agree with you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seikai

sentence.kanji: 10問中9問正解しました。
sentence.romaji: juumonchuu kyuumon seikai shimashita
sentence.english: Nine out of ten questions were answered correctly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ronbun

sentence.kanji: 論文を仕上げないと卒業できませんよ。
sentence.romaji: ronbun wo shiagenai to sotsugyou dekimasen yo
sentence.english: You can't graduate if you don't finish your thesis.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akushitsu

sentence.kanji: 最近は悪質な事件が多いですね。
sentence.romaji: saikin ha akushitsu na jiken ga ooi desu ne
sentence.english: There have been a lot of malicious incidents recently.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aka

sentence.kanji: 手の傷が悪化した。
sentence.romaji: te no kizu ga aka shita
sentence.english: The wound in my hand has gotten worse.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's endaka

sentence.kanji: 円高の影響で海外製品が安く買えますよ。
sentence.romaji: endaka no eikyou de kaigai seihin ga yasuku kaemasu yo
sentence.english: Overseas products can be bought more cheaply because of the strong yen.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kousou

sentence.kanji: 彼は新しい小説の構想を練っているの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha atarashii shousetsu no kousou wo nete iru no
sentence.english: He is developing a plot for his new novel.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kamaeru

sentence.kanji: 彼はあの通りに店を構えているの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ano toori ni mise wo kamaete iru no
sentence.english: He's set up his shop on that street.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kekou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は結構めがねが似合うね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kekou megane ga niau ne
sentence.english: Glasses suit her well.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kamau

sentence.kanji: 子供に構い過ぎてはいけない。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ni kamaisugite ha ikenai
sentence.english: You shouldn't bother yourself too much with your kids.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akuyou

sentence.kanji: 彼は地位を悪用しています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha chii wo akuyou shite imasu
sentence.english: He is abusing his position.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hani

sentence.kanji: 知っている範囲で教えてください。
sentence.romaji: shite iru hani de oshiete kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell us as much as you know.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sankakukei

sentence.kanji: この三角形の面積を出しなさい。
sentence.romaji: kono sankakukei no menseki wo dashinasai
sentence.english: Figure out the dimensions of this triangle.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's touron

sentence.kanji: その問題についてクラスで討論しました。
sentence.romaji: sono mondai ni tsuite kurasu de touron shimashita
sentence.english: The problem was discussed in class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ron

sentence.kanji: 彼の人生論は独特だな。
sentence.romaji: kare no jinseiron ha dokutoku da na
sentence.english: His philosophy of life is unique.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ronjiru

sentence.kanji: 仲間と地球の未来について論じたの。
sentence.romaji: nakama to chikyuu no mirai ni tsuite ronjita no
sentence.english: I discussed the future of the earth with my friends.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's benron

sentence.kanji: 弁論大会で優勝したことがあります。
sentence.romaji: benron taikai de yuushou shita koto ga arimasu
sentence.english: I've won a speech contest before.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's genron

sentence.kanji: 言論の自由は国民の権利です。
sentence.romaji: genron no jiyuu ha kokumin no kenri desu
sentence.english: Freedom of speech is the right of the people.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kekou

sentence.kanji: お腹がいっぱいなのでお代わりは結構です。
sentence.romaji: onaka ga ipai na no de okawari ha kekou desu
sentence.english: I'm full so I won't have a second helping, thanks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saikai

sentence.kanji: 試合はすぐに再開されたの。
sentence.romaji: shiai ha sugu ni saikai sareta no
sentence.english: The game was restarted at once.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saisei

sentence.kanji: 留守番電話のメッセージを再生したの。
sentence.romaji: rusubandenwa no mese-ji wo saisei shita no
sentence.english: I played back the messages on the answering machine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saikai

sentence.kanji: 彼らは互いに再会を喜んだの。
sentence.romaji: karera ha tagaini saikai wo yorokonda no
sentence.english: They were both very pleased to meet each other again.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's amu

sentence.kanji: 妹はマフラーを編みました。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha mafura- wo amimashita
sentence.english: My younger sister knitted a scarf.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's henshuu

sentence.kanji: 私は雑誌の編集の仕事をしています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha zashi no henshuu no shigoto wo shite imasu
sentence.english: I work as a magazine editor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaihou

sentence.kanji: 人質が解放されてよかった。
sentence.romaji: hitojichi ga kaihou sarete yokata
sentence.english: It is good that the hostage has been freed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koten

sentence.kanji: 私は古典を読むのが好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha koten wo yomu no ga suki desu
sentence.english: I like to read classics.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jiten

sentence.kanji: 知らない言葉を辞典で調べました。
sentence.romaji: shiranai kotoba wo jiten de shirabemashita
sentence.english: I looked up the word I didn't know in the dictionary.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenkeiteki

sentence.kanji: 彼女は典型的なイタリア人です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tenkeiteki na itariajin desu
sentence.english: She's a typical Italian.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tenkei

sentence.kanji: 彼は職人の典型です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha shokunin no tenkei desu
sentence.english: He's a typical artisan.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kounyuu

sentence.kanji: 入学式の後、教科書を購入してください。
sentence.romaji: nyuugakushiki no ato kyoukasho wo kounyuu shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please buy the textbooks after the entrance ceremony.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kougi

sentence.kanji: 彼の講義はとても分かりやすいですね。
sentence.romaji: kare no kougi ha totemo wakari yasui desu ne
sentence.english: His lectures are very easy to understand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kyuukou

sentence.kanji: 今日のフランス語の講座は休講です。
sentence.romaji: kyou no furansugo no kouza ha kyuukou desu
sentence.english: Today's French class is canceled.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koushi

sentence.kanji: 専門家を講師に招いた。
sentence.romaji: senmonka wo koushi ni maneita
sentence.english: We invited a specialist to lecture the class.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuui

sentence.kanji: 大声で話すと周囲の人に迷惑ですよ。
sentence.romaji: oogoe de hanasu to shuui no hito ni meiwaku desu yo
sentence.english: If you speak loudly you will disturb people around you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fureru

sentence.kanji: 手と手が触れてどきどきしたよ。
sentence.romaji: te to te ga furete dokidoki shita yo
sentence.english: My heart pounded as our hands touched.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saiaku

sentence.kanji: 何とか最悪の事態を避けることができました。
sentence.romaji: nantoka saiaku no jitai wo sakeru koto ga dekimashita
sentence.english: Somehow we managed to avert the worst-case scenario.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's donburi

sentence.kanji: 彼はご飯を丼で食べたよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha gohan wo donburi de tabeta yo
sentence.english: He ate rice in a big bowl.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's aku

sentence.kanji: 彼は悪を憎んでいます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha aku wo nikunde imasu
sentence.english: He hates evil.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's katayoru

sentence.kanji: 栄養が偏らないように食事に気を付けています。
sentence.romaji: eiyou ga katayoranai you ni shokuji ni ki wo tsukete imasu
sentence.english: I take care to maintain a balanced diet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's henken

sentence.kanji: 彼は世の中の偏見と戦ったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha yononaka no henken to tatakata n da
sentence.english: He fought against prejudice in the world.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ipenni

sentence.kanji: 春は一遍に花が咲く。
sentence.romaji: haru ha ipenni hana ga saku
sentence.english: Flowers bloom all together in spring.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nanben

sentence.kanji: この映画は何遍も見ました。
sentence.romaji: kono eiga ha nanben mo mimashita
sentence.english: I've seen this movie several times.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakomu

sentence.kanji: 久しぶりに家族全員で食卓を囲みました。
sentence.romaji: hisashiburi ni kazoku zenin de shokutaku wo kakomimashita
sentence.english: We had the entire family around the dinner table for the first time in a long time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's warugashikoi

sentence.kanji: 彼は悪賢い男だな。
sentence.romaji: kare ha warugashikoi otoko da na
sentence.english: He's a cunning fellow.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisan

sentence.kanji: 来年、衆議院が解散されるだろう。
sentence.romaji: rainen shuugiin ga kaisan sareru darou
sentence.english: The Lower House will probably be dissolved next year.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koudou

sentence.kanji: 全員、講堂に集まってください。
sentence.romaji: zenin koudou ni atsumate kudasai
sentence.english: Everyone, please come to the auditorium.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hyakajiten

sentence.kanji: めずらしい猫について百科事典で調べたの。
sentence.romaji: mezurashii neko ni tsuite hyakajiten de shirabeta no
sentence.english: I looked up a rare cat in the encyclopedia.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sharin

sentence.kanji: このトラックの車輪は頑丈そうですね。
sentence.romaji: kono toraku no sharin ha ganjou sou desu ne
sentence.english: The wheels of this truck look strong.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaisetsu

sentence.kanji: 新聞の解説欄を読みました。
sentence.romaji: shinbun no kaisetsu ran wo yomimashita
sentence.english: I read the comment column in the newspaper.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's igo

sentence.kanji: 彼の趣味は囲碁です。
sentence.romaji: kare no shumi ha igo desu
sentence.english: His hobby is playing Go.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akujo

sentence.kanji: 彼は悪女に騙されたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha akujo ni damasareta n da
sentence.english: He was betrayed by a wicked woman.
